name: Balancer GHO Aave Boosted StablePool
description: This token represents a Balancer Boosted liquidity pool which is composed of 3 other nested balancer pools and GHO. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pools, and can also deposit the LP to Balancer's gauges to earn BAL emissions. This pool contains GHO and bb-a-USD which consists of DAI & aDAI, USDC & aUSDC, USDT & aUSDT, the pool uses Aave for yield a decentralized money market on Ethereum.
